v8:item.v8:content: It will apply only to lists that have the "Email" column

Settings.QueryText: SELECT Users.Ref, Users.DeletionMark, Users.Predefined, Users.Description, CASE WHEN Users.DeletionMark THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS PictureNumber, UsersContactInformation.Presentation FROM Catalog.Users AS Users LEFT JOIN Catalog.Users.ContactInformation AS UsersContactInformation ON (UsersContactInformation.Ref = Users.Ref) AND (UsersContactInformation.KindForList = &Email) WHERE Users.IsInternal = FALSE AND Users.DeletionMark = FALSE AND Users.Invalid = FALSE AND TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM InformationRegister.UserGroupCompositions AS UserGroupCompositions WHERE UserGroupCompositions.User = Users.Ref AND UserGroupCompositions.UsersGroup = &UsersGroup)

SELECT CatalogUserGroups.Ref, CatalogUserGroups.DeletionMark, CatalogUserGroups.Predefined, CatalogUserGroups.Parent, CatalogUserGroups.Description, CASE WHEN CatalogUserGroups.DeletionMark THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS PictureNumber FROM Catalog.UserGroups AS CatalogUserGroups

v8:item.v8:content: Finish editing and close the form.
Find a contact by an email address.
Remove the contact from recipient list.
Search in email addresses and names.
Search only in email domain names.
